column5: Dates booked? Contact me about my other home.   Fully remodeled 3/2 home, walking distance to Comal River and Schlitterbahn!  Convenient to all things New Braunfels, fully furnished home that has been completely updated with hardwood floors, granite counters, stainless appliances and a large fenced in private backyard.   Drive 5 minutes to Gruene Hall, Gristmill and plenty other bars and restaurants, only 2 minutes to downtown New Braunfels. 15 minutes to the San Marcos outlet malls.
column8: Walking Distance to Schlitterbahn and Comal River
